attributes.action: Make I.D verification when using social media platforms.
attributes.additional_details: I have a social media platform and have podcasts that help people and help to advise people to realise there worth and strength. One thing I see at least 6 times a day are people being affected by hate comments and sometimes even during a live broadcast. I feel it is to easy to make an account on platforms, I want this to be changed.
attributes.background: Supply verified identification when using tik tok and other social media platforms.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Make verified ID a requirement for opening a social media account
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/598012
